name: Ulcinj Museum of Local History
description: {'Info': ['The Ulcinj Museum of Local History showcases the rich cultural and historical heritage of Ulcinj and its surroundings.', "The museum is housed in a former Venetian building and offers insights into the region's history, from the Illyrians to the Ottoman period."], 'Key Features': ["Exhibits on ancient artifacts, traditional costumes, maritime history, and Ulcinj's cultural evolution."], 'Visiting Tips': ['Monday to Saturday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sunday: Closed']}
short_description: A museum displaying Ulcinj’s history, with exhibits on ancient cultures, maritime heritage, and more.

name: Sailors' Mosque
description: {'Info': ['The Sailor’s Mosque (Džamija Pomoraca) in Ulcinj, originally built in the 14th century by the Moors, was rebuilt in 1798 by Ibrahim Pasha of Scutari.', 'Initially constructed for merchants to pray while trading, it became a cultural and religious center. The mosque was destroyed in 1931 but rebuilt in 2012 with the help of Turkish investors.'], 'Key Features': ['Ottoman architecture, historic significance to local sailors, minaret, and cultural center.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Respect the sacred site, visit during prayer times, and admire the views around the mosque.']}
short_description: A historic mosque with Ottoman architecture, originally built by Moors, later rebuilt in 2012.

name: Ulcinj Old Town
description: {'Info': ['Ulcinj Old Town is a medieval fortress overlooking the Adriatic, rich in history and cultural heritage.', 'Built by the Illyrians and later expanded by the Romans, Byzantines, and Ottomans, it was a pirate stronghold.'], 'Key Features': ['Stone walls, narrow streets, medieval architecture, museums, and stunning sea views.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Shops and Restaurants: Open from 9:00 AM to 11:00 PM.', 'Museums and Historical Sites: Typically open from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM (some may close for lunch).', "The Town Itself: Open for exploration at any time, though it's best to visit during daylight for safety and comfort."]}
